author: Xenia Tipa
comment: Beautiful and truly mysterious watchface. Love the colors. But I wish it was more customizable, e.g. I want always to see the fox, and to see date and weather would be nice.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good, but no hourly sound/vibration and no weather information. Good support.

author: James Bloomfield
comment: Love this watchface, however it completely disapeared from my Moto 360 watch face list. Hope it gets a fix.

author: Ramiro Mayorga
comment: I'd wish I could always see the fox, other than that, great watchface.

author: Frederic Van Cauwenberghe
comment: Stunning!

author: Dave Wikoff
comment: Nice but needs customization

author: Meri Ellen
comment: Very nice

author: Michelle
comment: Beautiful. Best I've seen yet!! Wish there was a date on it tho.

author: Tanz
comment: Nice .. Just neeed 1 analog styleeeee

author: Natalie Piscitello
comment: I had this watch face a year ago when I got my smart watch and now I'm going back to it. So cute!

author: Pam Cameron
comment: So pretty.

author: Teresa Nadolski
comment: Pretty!

author: Tisikkha Putri
comment: Love it

author: Mhisani Fox
comment: I love the art and effects however sadly on a lg watch r or lg watch urbane the sleeping state/dimmed r view occasionally corrupts and leaves an awkward static on the screen which is resolved with a notification or a touch. If this were fixed I'd be happy to pay for this. I have sent screenshots and an explanation to the developer but sadly nothing has come of it. Otherwise fantastic.
title: Fantastic but has a bug

author: Holo Zombie
comment: My fave watch face so far!. Love that you can change wether you want the stars twinkling or leafs blowing ect I've just downloaded so seeing how much battery it drains as mine never seems to hit below 80% in a day. Unless I'm reading wrong, it says my watch wouldn't support it being an s2 but it works beautifuly. Only gripe I have is that there's no date but all I've had to do is move the calendar so it's a case of turning my watch to see the date which isn't hard by any means
title: I honestly love it!

author: Ajay Borkar
comment: I like the art style of the watchface. The effects are really nice and being able to turn them on or off is helpful. My only problem is not having a day/date to view on the watchface. I did have a problem with the watchface after I put my Moto 360 1st gen on charge. The watchface stopped responding and showed it was in airplane mode until I changed the watchface.
title: Very Nice Looking

author: John Owens
comment: This watch face is literally my favorite thing about my watch. It isn't functional, but it is beautiful & elegant in a way that always brings a smile to my face. Even other smartwatch owners are jealous. My friend w/ a 2nd gen Apple Watch is super jealous of this face. THANK YOU DEVELOPERS/ARTISTS!   -- edit: I also get the "white static face" screen bug in my ZenWatch like other reviewers. But it only happens when I am charging the watch, & goes away with a touch. No big deal for me.
title: Perfect on Asus ZenWatch 2

author: 鄭坤煒
comment: The grey watch face is so beautiful, and the animals change every time，and they would come out when you tap different places on the watch face. But it crashes sometimes, and the brightness in ambient mode seems to be dimmer than expected.. solve it please
title: The animals and bugs...

author: Dan Fedida
comment: I think a bug is causing overheating problems. When this watch face is active the watch will randomly shutdown and charging will not complete. It will get stuck on a random percentage that's not 100! It's a shame because it's very nice and my daughter loves playing with it.
title: Issue with Moto 360 gen1

author: Foz Tacticus
comment: The only thing I would change would be too make the time font bolder on the grayscale ambient screen. Other than that? Perfect!
title: Really really good

author: David Sanchez
comment: Looks great.  But you get odd corrupt looking errors on the lg g watch (looks like an old tv with no reception).
title: Great looking, not for lg g watch

author: Lacey Jordan
comment: Very attractive! Drains the watch battery quickly if all effects are turned on, but is still very pretty without them! This is my new favorite. :3
title: Pretty!

author: Nicolas Guerra-Contreras
comment: It's a really neat watch face. Pleasant to look at. The details are a very nice touch, even if they drain battery a little more.
title: My go to

author: Nicholas Powell
comment: This watch face is so cute! It lost a star because the visuals corrupt every now and then
title: Really cute!!

author: anand mrk
comment: Love the simple night in the forest idea. Fireflies are absolutely fantastic. Minute details like the leaves animation are classy. But tradeoff is the battery sacrifice which one has to live with. But still it is good to set it whenever we have a need to relax.
title: Splendid

author: David B
comment: Watch face is basically a drawing of a forest. I only saw an outline of the fox in ambient mode.
title: Boring

author: Harriet Curtis
comment: Love it but it doesn't display the date 🙄
title: Little disappointed

author: Heather Bingham
comment: Mine never shows the bunnies :(
title: Nice watch face.wish it did a little more

author: James Folkert
comment: I like the watch face, however, it has a bug that prevents my watch from charging completely overnight.
title: Has a bug with charging on moto360 gen 1

author: Catherine Ko
comment: Just installed it for my tag connected watch.. love the gray ambient.. and now this will be my 2nd fav watch face so far.. please also add day & date.. that will be very helpul
title: Liking it

author: Sam Triglone
comment: I have used this face for a while but so far it has not shown anything other than fireflies. Not sure why?
title: No animals?

author: Josh Snavley
comment: Love the look and mood that this animated watch face offers. Great work.
title: Calming

author: Winnie Khoo
comment: totally love the design! it will be perfect Date could be added into the face.
title: love the animal

author: Tris Warkentin
comment: So neat looking 😁 - love how tapping different parts of the screen summons different animals!

author: Sumeet Gill
comment: Only thing missing is date
title: Looks great

author: Evgeny Golubev
comment: Ambient mode screen with deer is awesome.

author: Sidney olluyn
comment: Simple yet beautiful watch face. I miss the option to put the date on the screen though!
title: Good job!

author: Reza Barzegar
comment: This is the best way to make technology a window to the nature soul
title: Awsome

author: dan Bdan
comment: nothing great thought
title: it's ok
